title: Calories in Sunny D
meta_description: Learn calories in Sunny D per 8 oz serving, plus full nutrition breakdown including carbs, sugars, and sodium for this citrus drink.
assumptions: Original citrus punch flavor; standard 8 fl oz (240 ml) serving; values from typical product label, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, and serving size. Check product labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A 240 ml serving of Sunny D contains about 60 calories, primarily from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to Sunny D low sugar version per 100 ml
Add 1 oz real orange juice per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in Sunny D per serving?
faqs.a: About 60 calories in an 8 oz (240 ml) serving of original Sunny D.

faqs.q: Is Sunny D high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, 14 g of sugars per 240 ml serving, mostly added sugars.

faqs.q: Does Sunny D have fat or protein?
faqs.a: No fat or protein; it's primarily carbs from sugars.

faqs.q: Calories in Sunny D vs orange juice?
faqs.a: Sunny D has fewer calories (60 vs ~110 per 240 ml) but less natural nutrients.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in Sunny D?
